Title: Allows N.Y. city to amend point credits on the open competitive firefighter examination
Summary: Allows cities with a population of one million or more to amend point credits on the open competitive firefighter examination.
LawCode: Amd ยง58-a, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to allowing cities with a population of one million or more to amend point credits on the open competitive fire fighter examination
